items.title: Helena Moreno Is Elected Mayor of New Orleans
items.summary: Facing challenging political headwinds and deep frustration among residents, a Democratic city councilwoman promises a turnaround.

items.title: How Trump’s Chicago Immigration Crackdown Escalated, in 10 Videos
items.summary: Week by week, the federal campaign to ramp up immigration enforcement in the Chicago area has created fear and inflamed tensions.

items.title: South Carolina Bar Shooting Leaves at Least 4 Dead, Sheriff Says
items.summary: Four people were in critical condition after an early-morning shooting that left 12 other people injured on Sunday in St. Helena, S.C., according to the Beaufort County Sheriff’s Office.

items.title: Trump Announces Longtime Aide Dan Scavino as Head of Personnel
items.summary: Mr. Scavino, one of Mr. Trump’s most trusted advisers and a deputy chief of staff, has been by his side since the 2016 campaign.

items.title: Rethinking Bruce Springsteen’s Difficult Years
items.summary: A film argues that an American icon may have made his best music in some of his lowest moments.

items.title: The Destructive Legacy of California’s Zombie Fires
items.summary: Blazes that firefighters thought had died but then later came roaring back to life have become increasingly common, heightening scrutiny of how first-responders put out wildfires.

items.title: Trump ‘looking at all options’ amid threats to invoke Insurrection Act, Vance says
items.summary: <p>Vice-president calls crime ‘out of control’ in US cities as Trump faces legal battles for use of federal forces</p><p>The White House is talking about invoking the <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/oct/07/trump-insurrection-act-explainer">Insurrection Act</a> that would allow the deployment of military troops on US soil to quell domestic unrest amid legal challenges over the moves, <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/jd-vance">JD Vance</a> confirmed on Sunday.</p><p>Vance was asked on NBC News’s Meet the Press whether <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/donaldtrump">Donald Trump</a> was seriously considering invoking the emergency power to deploy national guard forces and even the US military in domestic settings.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/oct/12/trump-vance-insurrection-act-military">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: South Carolina bar shooting leaves four people dead and 20 injured, officials say
items.summary: <p>Shooting occurred early Sunday at Willie’s Bar and Grill on idyllic St Helena island </p><p>A mass shooting at a crowded bar on an idyllic South Carolina island has left four people dead and at least 20 injured, officials say.</p><p>The shooting occurred early Sunday at Willie’s Bar and Grill on St Helena island, officials said. A large crowd was at the scene when sheriff’s deputies arrived and found several people suffering from gunshot wounds.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/oct/12/south-carolina-bar-shooting">Continue reading...</a>
